Hi,

Sorry for late answer (Christmas Holiday :-)

Can you describe the error in more detail? Do you have the Exception in WinRT app? Maybe you can send me your project.

In WinRT the error messages are often not very helpful. In most cases they come from missing StaticResources.

Kind regards,

Torsten

why?
